title: Why does Wang Qiang decide to go Minghu Park

content.prompt: What is the main reason why Wang Qiang decided to go to Minghu Park on the weekend?

choices.label: He needs to walk the dog.
There is a job fair in the park.
There is a blind date event on the weekend.
His mother has arranged for him to meet a woman.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
